codebase_path.title: Codebase Path
codebase_path.description: Absolute path to the codebase to analyze (e.g., /Users/zeihanaulia/Programming/research/agent)

feature_request.title: Feature Request
feature_request.description: The feature to implement (e.g., 'Add user authentication')

dry_run.title: Dry Run
dry_run.description: If true, show changes without applying them. If false, apply changes directly.
